definition: strong/powerful/better/slightly more than/vigorous/violent/best in their category, e.g. see 百強|百强[bai3 qiang2]
to force/to compel/to strive/to make an effort
sound/noise/note (of musical scale)/tone/news/syllable/reading (phonetic value of a character)
to tread/to stamp/to step on/to press a pedal/to investigate on the spot
board/plank/plate/shutter/table tennis bat/clappers (music)/CL:塊|块[kuai4]/accented beat in Chinese music/hard/stiff/to stop smiling or look serious
